instruction: Sometimes users of dialogue systems ask vague questions/queries from the system. In this case, the system asks them a clarifying question to be able to answer it correctly. In this task, you are given a question/query in natural language and your task is to ask a good clarifying question to understand the given question/query more precisely.
input: Tell me about electronic skeet shoot.
output: are you interested to see images of it, what specific type of electronic skeet shoot are you interested in, what would you like to know about electronic skeet shoot, would you like find out where you can play electronic skeet shoot, would you like the instructions for electronic skeet shoot, would you like to know different types of it, would you like to see the retailers selling it, would you wanting to know how to set one up, are you interested where to find one, are you looking for product recalls, are you looking for reviews related to it, are you needing to know what its used for, are you wanting to know what it is, do you want to know how to use it, do you want to know what electronic skeet shoot is, what brand of electronic skeet shoot are you inquiring about
